name: NTP Service
description: Ensures time synchronization service (systemd-timesyncd or ntp) is active.
check_cmd: if command -v systemctl >/dev/null 2>&1; then if systemctl is-active systemd-timesyncd >/dev/null 2>&1 || systemctl is-active ntp >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo ok; else echo fix; fi; else echo ok; fi
fix_cmd: if command -v systemctl >/dev/null 2>&1; then systemctl restart systemd-timesyncd >/dev/null 2>&1 || systemctl restart ntp >/dev/null 2>&1 || true; fi
verify_cmd: if systemctl is-active systemd-timesyncd >/dev/null 2>&1 || systemctl is-active ntp >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo ok; else echo fail; fi
